name: 67% True Doom T-Shirt
description:
Finally! For all of you who are 67% TRUE DOOM we have black merchandise. There is none more black.

White print on 100% cotton Gildan Heavy t-shirts.

Front print has a psychic-demon-knight... "I got carried away" says the artist. On the reverse is THE statement to make in 2013: 67% TRUE DOOM.

Order with The Divine Right of Kings on vinyl (http://groan.bigcartel.com/product/groan-the-divine-right-of-kings-lp) and get the album on CD for free!

All orders receive a free Groan logo vinyl sticker.

Worldwide shipping!

name: Groan - The Divine Right of Kings (LP)
description:
Groan's second album, The Divine Right of Kings, on heavyweight 180g black vinyl. EXTREMELY LIMITED!

Artwork by W. Ralph Walters. Inner sleeve features spirit board artwork exclusive to vinyl.

"There's a sense of groove and swagger to every one of the 10 tracks on offer: a real party album" - Terrorizer

"Reminiscent of Cathedral at their most unabashedly rocking... infectious and fist-pumpingly dopey... It’s an easy record to be excited about and I can’t think of a reason not to be. Recommended." - The Obelisk

"Have you ever been driving down the road and just needed to bang your head endlessly? Well, the new Groan album will have you doing that no questions asked! Fucking fun!" - Destructive Music 9/10

"Awesome record with kind of a "party hard, drink until you drop and don't give a fuck"-vibe!" - Lords of Metal 80/100 

Order with a t-shirt (http://groan.bigcartel.com/product/throne-of-weed-t-shirt) and get The Divine Right of Kings on CD for free!

All orders received through our BigCartel store will receive a free Groan logo vinyl sticker for vandalising local pub toilets with.

Release date: October 26th 2012

Soulseller Records (SSR053LP)

name: Groan - The Divine Right of Kings (CD)
description:
Groan's second album, The Divine Right of Kings, on compact disc. Released by Soulseller Records (SSR053).

"There's a sense of groove and swagger to every one of the 10 tracks on offer: a real party album" - Terrorizer

"Reminiscent of Cathedral at their most unabashedly rocking... infectious and fist-pumpingly dopey... It’s an easy record to be excited about and I can’t think of a reason not to be. Recommended." - The Obelisk

"Have you ever been driving down the road and just needed to bang your head endlessly? Well, the new Groan album will have you doing that no questions asked! Fucking fun!" - Destructive Music 9/10

"Awesome record with kind of a "party hard, drink until you drop and don't give a fuck"-vibe!" - Lords of Metal 80/100 

Artwork by W. Ralph Walters.

Release date: 26th October 2012

FREE SHIPPING

name: Witchy Woman T-Shirt
description:
Sexy times abound with these t-shirts with artwork designed by Ralph Walters.

This Witchy Woman is featured on the artwork of the vinyl version of "The Divine Right of Kings".

Also available in ladies skinny fit style.

Black ink on white Gildan heavy cotton t-shirts.

Order with The Divine Right of Kings on vinyl (http://groan.bigcartel.com/product/groan-the-divine-right-of-kings-lp) and get the album on CD for free!

All orders receive a free Groan logo vinyl sticker.

Worldwide shipping!

name: T-Shirt + CD: TOTAL DOOM DISCOUNT
description:
Our new album, The Divine Right of Kings, on CD (http://groan.bigcartel.com/product/groan-the-divine-right-of-kings-cd) and our brand new bright white Witchy Woman t-shirt (http://groan.bigcartel.com/product/throne-of-weed-t-shirt).

If you'd like to order it with a 67% TRUE DOOM t-shirt, simply leave a note when you pay through PayPal.

What value!

name: Limited edition A3 Desertfest poster
description:
To commemorate our performance at Desertfest 2013 we commissioned a super limited edition run of A3 size posters designed by Growth's Brain Dribbles (https://www.facebook.com/GrowthsBrainDribbles).

Each poster is numbered.

Full colour print on 135gsm silk paper.

All orders also receive a free Groan logo vinyl sticker.

name: Groan & Vinum Sabbatum Split EP (CD)
description:
We teamed up to release a split EP with Finnish rockers Vinum Sabbatum.

This is what people said...

"Groan take 70’s rock and give it a modern kick in the nuts" - The Sleeping Shaman

"[Groan] are also one of the very best at delivering killer tunes that never leave your memory and these 2 tracks are pure golden nuggets of heavy, groove-based doom-rock... 9/10" - Doommantia

"I'm very happy that Groan are from the UK, and must query as to why I have yet to see them at Bloodstock" - The Number of the Blog

"From the sounds of it, the [Groan] boys had a little too much fun the day before recording [the split]" - The Soda Shop

DOOMANOID RECORDS (NOID007)

All orders receive a free Groan logo vinyl sticker.

name: Groan - The Sleeping Wizard CD
description:
Our debut album, The Sleeping Wizard, on CD.

Released in 2010 on Doomanoid Records (NOID005).

"Doom diehards will absolutely love this album's dedication to walloping, great riffs" - Kerrang!

"Awesome, mind-expanding riffs so spaced out they're practically aliens" - Terrorizer

"This is what all 'Stoner Rock' is meant to be... 10/10" - Doommantia

"In so many ways it kicks more ass than most of the albums that have been released by established time served bands... Groan are keeping the riff alive and well and giving us what Cathedral have failed to do over the last two albums" - The Sleeping Shaman

1. Ride of the Antichrist
2. Witchy Woman
3. Psychedelic Demons
4. Deadly Omens
5. The Martyr King
6. Sleeping Wizard
7. Ancient Space (Master of Time)

All orders receive a free Groan logo vinyl sticker.
